name: Tsuto

specials.name: Flurry of Blows
specials.description: Make two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally. As it has the flourish trait, you can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: When your enemy can’t properly defend itself, you take advantage to deal extra damage. If you Strike a creature that has the flat-footed condition (page 620) with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, you deal an extra 1d6 precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown melee weapon, that weapon must also be agile or finesse.

specials.name: Nimble Dodge
specials.description: Requirements You are not encumbered. Trigger A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker. You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

description:
**During Combat** Tsuto’s main advantage in battle is his mobility. He uses Acrobatics to move around the battlefield and flanks foes with his goblins as he can.
**Morale** If brought below 16 hit points, or if all of his goblins are slain, Tsuto runs for his life down the smuggler’s tunnel, abandoning all thought of returning to Nualia with his sister in tow and fleeing back to Thistletop.
items: Healing Potion (minor), composite shortbow with 20 arrows, Flute (Virtuoso Handheld), Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator),  silver earrings (n gp for the pair), journal, 6 pouches of gold dust worth n gp each, 8 pouches of silver dust worth n gp each, n pp
